Texts.Chs: ^orange;交流发电机^reset;能为你提供电力。当然，你需要^green;水或煤^reset;来供能。要将它连接到电器，你首先需要解锁^orange;物质枪^reset;的^orange;连线模式^reset;或者制造一个^orange;技工扳手^reset;。
Texts.Eng: An ^orange;Alternator^reset; provides you with power. To fuel it, you'll need ^green;water or coal^reset;. To wire it to things, you'll first need to unlock ^orange;Wiring^reset; on your ^orange;Matter Manipulator^reset; or build a ^orange;Mechanic's Wrench^reset;.
Try throwing some ^orange;Coal or Wood^reset; in there now to give your new ^orange;Alternator^reset; some life!
